Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers

Class ConsoleLogger

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers.BaseLogger
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers.ConsoleLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filtered<LogEntry>, Flushable, Receiver<Transmittable>, NamedObject, Logger, Listener, Transceiver
public class ConsoleLogger extends BaseLogger
A simple logger for bootstrapping purposes (the logging system itself may need to do logging, for example, which can lead to problems)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
